label: 京職
本: The Moneylenders of Late Medieval Kyoto . University of Hawai'i Press . 2001
説明文: Capital Office of the imperial government. Its duties included recording the population through a household registration (koseki) [戸籍] system and policing the city (p. 15). ↓[MS:  There were two Kyoshiki; one for the eastern and one for the western part of the city respectively]
